column1: What is William Wedo's area of expertise?
column2: William Wedo's expertise includes mass media, public relations, and digital storytelling.

column1: What notable positions has William Wedo held in his career?
column2: William Wedo has served as the director of marketing and communications for Philadelphia’s Academy of Natural Sciences and worked at the Studio Incamminati, School for Contemporary Realist Art. He was also an award-winning journalist at the Dallas Morning News and a founding staff member of Philly.com.

column1: What kind of marketing campaigns has William Wedo led?
column2: William Wedo has led marketing campaigns for national museum exhibitions and coordinated worldwide public relations efforts for scientific discoveries.

column1: How has William Wedo contributed to the realist art community?
column2: At the Studio Incamminati, School for Contemporary Realist Art, William Wedo helped build the educational startup into a leading worldwide brand in the realist art community through integrated marketing efforts.

column1: Can you mention any innovative marketing efforts by William Wedo?
column2: William Wedo developed and executed integrated marketing efforts including email newsletters, direct mail campaigns, and Facebook Live painting demonstrations, which attracted tens of thousands of viewers.

column1: What awards has William Wedo received in his career?
column2: William Wedo is an award-winning journalist, having received accolades for his work at the Dallas Morning News.

column1: What degrees does William Wedo hold?
column2: William Wedo holds an M.A. in journalism from Temple University and an MBA from Westchester University of Pennsylvania.

column1: What is Youshan Zhang's area of expertise?
column2: Youshan Zhang specializes in machine learning, computer vision, transfer learning, manifold learning, and shape analysis.

column1: What has been a focus of Youshan Zhang's postdoctoral research?
column2: During his postdoctoral associate position in the Department of Clinical Sciences at Cornell University, Youshan Zhang focused on applying deep learning models in veterinary science to detect diseases in animals and analyze different animal behaviors.

column1: What degrees does Youshan Zhang hold?
column2: Youshan Zhang holds a Ph.D. in computer science from Lehigh University and a master's degree in neuroimaging and informatics from USC.

column1: In which academic department does Youshan Zhang currently serve as an assistant professor?
column2: Youshan Zhang is an assistant professor of artificial intelligence and computer science.

column1: What is Yuri Katz's area of expertise?
column2: Yuri Katz's expertise lies in the financial applications of cognitive computational platforms, which combine distributed, cloud-based ecosystems with machine learning- and NLP-based technologies and advanced signal processing.

column1: What is Yuri Katz's current position and what are his responsibilities?
column2: Yuri Katz is the senior director of data science at S&P Global Market Intelligence, where his team supports businesses with innovative solutions based on fundamental sciences, machine learning technologies, advanced risk-valuation, big data, and predictive analytics.

column1: Can you describe some of the projects Yuri Katz has led?
column2: Yuri Katz has led projects ranging from forecasting systemic market downturns to projecting global hurricanes activity, using cutting-edge, cloud-based distributed data and computational platforms.

column1: What was Yuri Katz's role before becoming senior director of data science?
column2: Before becoming senior director of data science, Yuri Katz was senior director of enterprise architecture for 17 years, involved in various task forces and committees that addressed major IT and strategic business initiatives.

column1: What kind of academic background does Yuri Katz have?
column2: Yuri Katz holds a Ph.D. in chemical physics from the Institute of Chemical Kinetics and Combustion at the Russian Academy of Sciences.

column1: In what type of international conferences does Yuri Katz frequently speak?
column2: Yuri Katz is a frequent keynote speaker at international conferences on topics such as topological data analysis, credit risk, and climate finance.

column1: What are Zesarae Bodie's educational qualifications?
column2: Zesarae Bodie has a Bachelor of Science (BSc) and a Master of Public Health (MPH) from Florida A&M University, Florida. She also holds a Master of Occupational Therapy (MOT) and a Doctor of Occupational Therapy (OTD) from the University of Saint Augustine for the Health Sciences, Florida.

column1: How long has Zesarae Bodie been practicing as an occupational therapist, and what is her specialty?
column2: Zesarae Bodie has been a practicing occupational therapist for over 10 years, specializing in the older adult/geriatric population.

column1: In what settings has Zesarae Bodie provided care?
column2: Zesarae Bodie has provided care in various settings across many states in the USA, working with patients throughout the lifespan, from pediatric to geriatric.

column1: What teaching experience does Zesarae Bodie have outside of occupational therapy?
column2: Besides her work in occupational therapy, Zesarae Bodie has experience teaching at the middle school level.

column1: What role does Zesarae Bodie currently hold at Yeshiva University?
column2: Zesarae Bodie is a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Katz School at Yeshiva University.

column1: How did Zesarae Bodie contribute during the COVID-19 pandemic?
column2: During the COVID-19 pandemic, Zesarae Bodie worked as a frontline worker, assisting in rehabilitating the elderly and continuing to provide in-home services throughout New York City.

column1: What are Zesarae Bodie's personal thoughts on joining Yeshiva University?
column2: Zesarae Bodie expressed excitement and gratitude for the opportunity to merge her passions for education and occupational therapy at Yeshiva University, looking forward to sharing her knowledge and experiences with future therapists.

column1: How can someone contact Zesarae Bodie?
column2: Zesarae Bodie can be contacted via email at zesarae.bodie@yu.edu, by phone at 646-592-4730, or through her office at the Dora Rousso Building, Room 405, Jack and Pearl Resnick Campus, 1165 Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10461.
